TestCase.name: testDifferentPartitionKey
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(r => TABLE t PARTITION BY score, i => 1)

LogicalProject(score=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($1), 1, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER score, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($1), 1, DEFAULT())], uid=[f], select=[score,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER score, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[score]]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyArgs
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(uid => 'my-ptf')
LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(_UTF-16LE'my-ptf')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)])
ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(_UTF-16LE'my-ptf')], uid=[my-ptf], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ }]])

TestCase.name: testScalarArgsNoUid
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(i => 1, b => true)
LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(1, true, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)])
ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(1, true, DEFAULT())], uid=[null], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ }]])

TestCase.name: testUidPipelineSplitIntoTwoFunctions
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'a')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'b')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'a')], uid=[a], select=[name,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'b')], uid=[b], select=[name,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testScalarArgsWithUid
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(uid => 'my-uid', i => 1, b => true)
LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(1, true, _UTF-16LE'my-uid')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)])
ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(1, true, _UTF-16LE'my-uid')], uid=[my-uid], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ }]])

TestCase.name: testTableAsRowOptionalUid
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_sink], fields=[out, count]) +- LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 1, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_sink], fields=[out, count]) +- LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 42, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])(reuse_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_sink], fields=[out, count]) +- ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 1, DEFAULT())], uid=[null], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_sink], fields=[out, count]) +- ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 42, DEFAULT())], uid=[null], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testTableAsRowPassThroughColumns
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(r => TABLE t, i => 1)

LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1], out=[$2], count=[$3]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 1, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, INTEGER score, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 1, DEFAULT())], uid=[null], select=[name,score,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, INTEGER score, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1], out=[$2], count=[$3]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, INTEGER score, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, DEFAULT())], uid=[f], select=[name,score,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, INTEGER score, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

TestCase.name: testUidPipelineMergeIntoOneFunction
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'same')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'same')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'same')], uid=[same], select=[name,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testUidPipelineMergeWithFanOut
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, _UTF-16LE'Bob')]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'same')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], out=[$1], count=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, _UTF-16LE'Alice')]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'same')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], score=[$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])

ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0) PARTITION BY($0), 1, _UTF-16LE'same')], uid=[same], select=[name,out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(5) name, VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ _UTF-16LE'Bob', 12 }, { _UTF-16LE'Alice', 42 }]])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- Calc(select=['Bob' AS name, out, count], where=[(name = 'Bob')]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.t_keyed_sink], fields=[name, out, count]) +- Calc(select=['Alice' AS name, out, count], where=[(name = 'Alice')]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testUnknownScalarArg
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(i => 1, b => true, invalid => 'invalid')
LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(1, true, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)])
ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(1, true, DEFAULT())], uid=[null], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ }]])

TestCase.name: testTypedTableAsRowIgnoringColumnNames
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM f(u => TABLE t_name_diff, i => 1)

LogicalProject(out=[$0], count=[$1]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 1, DEFAULT())], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], different=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(name=[_UTF-16LE'Bob'], different=[12]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

ProcessTableFunction(invocation=[f(TABLE(#0), 1, DEFAULT())], uid=[null], select=[out,count], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) out, INTEGER count)]) +- Calc(select=['Bob' AS name, 12 AS different]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])
